starving_elder: Oh...? Is that mouse for me?
[t_c stares longingly at the prey, eyes dull with hunger.]
No, you take it, young'un. It's not long before I take my place in StarClan, and you need your strength.
theystarving_1: [t_c kneads their stomach, eyes hollow with hunger.]
[Seems like this famine is really doing a number on everyone ...]
theystarving_2: Is it time for another hunting patrol already?
[t_c struggles to their paws and heads to the camp's entrance.]
Let's hope we catch something this time...
they_starving_3: This situation... I can barely describe it.
'Hunger is the killer of the mind' is something the elders used to tell me. I think I finally understand that.
I can barely focus on anything else.
We need to find more prey. The Clan can't thrive like this.
they_starving_5: [t_c was staring up at the trees, scanning the branches.]
You know, y_c. It seems this hunger is affecting everything. The grass seems dry, and the little birds that normally sing above our camp haven't appeared.
It's demoralising. I don't know how we'll go on, y_c.
they_starving_6: I'd give anything for a nice mouse right now. StarClan, I'd even settle for a stale one! Anything to get rid of this hunger...
starving_queen: [t_c stares into the nursery, eyes hollow.]
None of the kits have been out to play today.
[t_c makes a choking sound, avoiding your gaze.]
Th-they're usually always so energetic... I don't...
y_c, I don't know what to do! This starvation it's.. I know it affects the kits. I need to get some prey. I can't think.
theystarving_sweet1: [Despite their obvious hunger, you can see t_c nudging what little they have to r_c.]
[They look at you and smile tiredly, the pain meant nothing to them if it meant they could help someone else.]
theystarving_sweet2: I'm gonna do what I can to get more food... I promise.
If I can't, you can have my portion tonight.. I don't mind.
theystarving_sweet3: [Despite everything, t_c continues to smile. Despite everything, they keep trying to make you happy.]
StarClan will bring us food, we just need to be patient.
[Despite everything... the look in their eyes tells you they're just as hopeless as you are.]
youstarving_1: [t_c drops a small mouse at your paws, nosing it towards you.]
Eat. We all need to keep our strength up, especially in times like these.
you_starving_2: [t_c comes trotting up to you, worry carved into their face.]
You know... I didn't expect that you would fall victim to hunger. You always seemed too strong for it.
Please... just hold on for a little bit longer. I'll make sure that the next fresh kill goes to you.
you_starving_3: [t_c scans over the fresh kill pile, it appearing to be barren.]
There's still no fresh kill. Nothing's been found.
[Their voice hitches and they sniff quietly to themself.]
This... why would StarClan do this to us...?
you_starving_4: [You turn to look up at t_c.]
Listen... I know you're hungry, but we need more cats on hungry --- hunting. Hunting patrol.
There's nothing in the fresh kill pile, and we're getting a little desperate. Maybe you might be able to find something? A fresh pair of eyes is helpful.
I know, I know. I wouldn't ask if it wasn't essential, y_c. You know this.
you_starving_6: [t_c trudges back into camp with their head and tail lowered in defeat. Their dull eyes meet yours and they shake their head.]
There's not even so much as a mouse out there... I'm sorry. Let's try not to worry though, we have to catch at least something sooner or later!
you_starving_7: Ironic, isn't it? Greenleaf is supposed to be the time of year when prey is the most abundant, yet here we are. Starving.
theystarving_silly: Y'know, I heard that if you imagine a meal in vivid enough detail, you can trick your brain into thinking you've eaten!
Okay, so ... I'm imagining a mouse still warm from the hunting patrol, with super tender flesh.
Now I'm imagining a ginormous fish shimmering with scales!
Now, I'm imagining one -- no, two -- no, ten squirrels, topped off with a vole or two, and maybe a sparrow to finish it all off!
... Man. If anything, all that did was make me even hungrier.
you_starving_8: [t_c noses a small sparrow towards you.]
Please, t_c, you have to eat something.
It's very moving to see your dedication to the Clan during this period of hardship, but no cat can go without forever.
Your life is not worth any less than the rest of ours. c_nClan needs you healthy.
Promise me you'll eat it and regain your strength, okay?
you_starving_9: [t_c drops a tiny mouse at your paws and looks away shyly.]
I know it's not much, but ... the hunting patrol couldn't bring much back. It's all I could manage to save for you.
I ... I'll be fine. Don't worry.
they_starving_4: [A newborn kitten kneads against a queen trying to get milk, but seemingly being unable to.]
[The queen gives you a sad glance before gently licking their forehead.]
you_starving_5: [You look over to see t_c coming over to you, a bundle of herbs wrapped in a leaf in their mouth. They gently place the package down next to you.]
Listen, I've noticed that... well you're not doing okay. This starvation is awful for the body and the mind. I've been thinking about it since yesterday, and I decided to make some herb bundles.

They're normally for traveling, but I suppose in a morbid sense this is its own kind of adventure. Please will you eat them? I've made a bundle for all the cats that need it, so you don't need to worry that you're taking herbs off of someone else.
In case you're wondering, it's a mixture of honey, chamomile and willow herb, and wrapped in a laurel leaf.
... there we go. Thank you y_c. Hopefully there will be more fresh-kill soon.
you_starving_51: [You look over to see t_c coming over to you, a bundle of herbs wrapped in a leaf in their mouth. They gently place the package down next to you.]
Listen, I've noticed that... well you're not doing okay. This starvation is awful for the body and the mind. I've been thinking about it since yesterday, and I decided to make some herb bundles.

They're normally for traveling, but I suppose in a morbid sense this is its own kind of adventure. Please will you eat them? I've made a bundle for all the cats that need it, so you don't need to worry that you're taking herbs off of someone else.
In case you're wondering, it's a mixture of honey, chamomile and willow herb, and wrapped in a laurel leaf.
... there we go. Thank you y_c. Hopefully there will be more fresh-kill soon.

There's still no fresh kill. Nothing's been found.
[Their voice hitched and they sniffed quietly to themself.]
This... why would StarClan do this to us...?
